material: cast iron construction with neoprene coating
usage: exercise and resistance training for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
key_features: Printed weight number on each end cap
ai_description: Two vibrant pink dumbbells with a smooth, matte neoprene coating rest on a clean white surface. Each dumbbell features hexagonal ends painted white with the brand 'KAKSS' and weight '1 KG' clearly printed in white text. The compact design shows a precision hex shape that provides stability. The dumbbells have a consistent texture and bright color that appears durable and fade-resistant.
target_audience: home gym users and fitness enthusiasts
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
